title: Hunger of Hadar
content:
Conjuration Spell

2d6Cold + 2d6Acid (Conditional)

Creatures within this black sphere are Blinded and take damage at the end of their turn and the start of their turn.

Creatures starting their turn in the area take 2~12 Cold damage. Creatures ending their turn in the area possibly take 2~12 Acid damage.

The area is Difficult Terrain.

18m DEX Save Concentration
